name: Know Your TV Shows Quiz | TV Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: What planet is the space alien ALF from?
Who had NOT been voted off the 'Survivor' island as of Aug 6th, 2000?
Who was the actor that played Steve Urkel?
What was Al Bundy's favourite nudity magazine?
Which of the following 'buddies' did not wear glasses on a regular basis?
What was Ilene (Al's girlfriend from 'Home Improvement') job?
Who was not a main character from 'Cheers'?
Who was not a guest celebrity on 'Friends'?
Which of the following was never one of Bart Simpson's pets?
questions.explanation:
Pinchy.

	Pinchy was Homer's lobster's name!

questions.text: Who is not a voice of a cartoon character?
questions.explanation:
Joey Griz.

	Seth Green on 'Family Guy', Howie Mandell was Bobby from 'Bobby's World', and Dan Castellaneta does several voices on the 'Simpsons'!
